price: 101. Jie gyvens tame (Pragaro Ugnies būsenoje) – ir blogas iš tiesų bus šis krovinys jiems Prikėlimo Dieną.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
